items.title: EPA shutters its scientific research arm, with hundreds expected to be impacted
items.description: The EPA's Office of Research and Development has more than 1,500 employees, including scientists and researchers, dispersed across the U.S.

items.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (July 20)
items.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

items.title: CBS News poll: Most Americans favor U.S. returning to moon, going to Mars
items.description: Many think the space program adds to feelings of national pride and patriotism, a CBS News poll shows.

items.title: Americans on whether the U.S. should return to the moon, travel to Mars
